text: <@U0207Q0URQC> - we track this with a combination of collecting leads via gated content and UTM tracking. Nothing super fancy. With regards to attributing data, that is done via Salesforce - as the leads that are either generated or “influenced” by the content are tracked automatically as part of their buyer’s journey
